intro: Monelasmum micranthum, commonly known as the small-flowered monelasmum, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its small, white to pale yellow flowers that bloom in clusters. Its leaves are simple, opposite, and often have a slightly hairy texture. It thrives in moist, well-drained soils and is often found in woodland or grassland habitats.
